attributes.additional_details:
99% of the time the Criminal Justice System is way too lenient and it needs to be changed. Therefore I am trying to take action and make a change. We, our families, our friends and neighbours are not getting justice for crimes that affect us. This issue surrounds our daily lives and something NEEDS to be done. So please, if you agree with the motion I am putting forward that the judicial system needs to be changed, sign now!

Thank you.
